caption.title: Illustration and characterization of bipyramid like prisms of co-precursor.
caption.p: a, b FESEM images. c TEM image and d EDS elemental mapping of co-precursor. e, f FESEM images of BPCO. g FESEM image. h Low-resolution TEM image. i High-resolution TEM image and j, k SAED patterns of BPCS.
